## Description {#details}

Generic disassembler for all <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> platforms.

All each platform class should have to do is subclass the constructor, and provide a different disassemblerMode value.

Definition at line 1838 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassembler-cpp">X86Disassembler.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getInstruction() {#a5872d463242e5872d4df00b5862e403f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCDisassembler::DecodeStatus X86GenericDisassembler::getInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; Instr, uint64&#95;t &amp; Size, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Bytes, uint64&#95;t Address, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; CStream) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns the disassembly of a single instruction.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Instr">- An MCInst to populate with the contents of the instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">- A value to populate with the size of the instruction, or the number of bytes consumed while attempting to decode an invalid instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Address">- The address, in the memory space of region, of the first byte of the instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Bytes">- A reference to the actual bytes of the instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CStream">- The stream to print comments and annotations on.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
- MCDisassembler::Success if the instruction is valid, MCDisassembler::SoftFail if the instruction was disassemblable but invalid, MCDisassembler::Fail if the instruction was invalid.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassembler-cpp/#l01844">1844</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/disassembler/x86disassembler-cpp">X86Disassembler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
